blocks.name: ccatmulgnn0dir
blocks.content: Concatenation of words follow the rule ~ mulgnn0dir (although applying ~ mulgnn0dir would require ` S ` to be a set). In this case ` A ` is ` <" K "> ` to the power ` M ` in the free monoid. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Oct-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm ccatmulgnn0dir(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cconcat, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c3), csn(c4)))
  -| wceq(c1, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c5), csn(c4)))
  -| wceq(c2, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c3, caddc, c5)), csn(c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cn0))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(co(c0, cconcat, c1), c2, cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))), cif(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))))), cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c3, caddc, c5)), c4), w0)
  mpteq12dva(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))), cif(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))), co(nat0, cfzo, co(c3, caddc, c5)), c4, w0)
  oveq2d(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1)), co(c3, caddc, c5), w0)
  oveq12d(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1), c3, c5, w0)
  ifeqda(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c0))), c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c4), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, c3)))
  eleqtrd(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, c3), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wceq(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), co(nat0, cfzo, c3)), w0)
  simpll(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))))
  oveq2d(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0), c3, w0)
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c4), wf(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c3), csn(c4)))
  mpbird(w0, wf(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c3), csn(c4)), wf(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c3), csn(c4)), co(nat0, cfzo, c3), csn(c4)))
  syl(w0, wf(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c3), csn(c4)), co(nat0, cfzo, c3), csn(c4)), wcel(c4, c6))
  fconstg(c4, c6, co(nat0, cfzo, c3))
  feq1d(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c3), csn(c4), cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c3), csn(c4)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c0, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c3), csn(c4))))
  fvconst(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c3), c4, cv(hs0))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))))), wceq(cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c0))), c4), w0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c0)), co(nat0, cfzo, c5)))
  eleqtrd(co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c0)), co(nat0, cfzo, c5), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))))))
  syl22anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c0)), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1)))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cz), wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cz))
  simplr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1)))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))))
  nn0zd(cfv(chash, c0), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))))))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))))), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), w0)
  eqeltrd(cfv(chash, c0), cn0, c3, w0)
  eqtrd(cfv(chash, c0), c3, co(c3, cmul, nat1), w0)
  syl5eq(cfv(chash, c0), co(c3, cmul, nat1), co(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, c3)), cmul, cfv(chash, csn(c4))), w0)
  eqtri(cfv(chash, c0), co(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, c3)), cmul, cfv(chash, csn(c4))), cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c3), csn(c4))))
  fveq2i(chash, c0, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c3), csn(c4)))
  mp2an(wceq(cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c3), csn(c4))), co(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, c3)), cmul, cfv(chash, csn(c4)))), wcel(co(nat0, cfzo, c3), cfn), wcel(csn(c4), cfn))
  fzofi(nat0, c3)
  hashxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c3), csn(c4))
  oveq12d(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, c3)), cmul, cfv(chash, csn(c4)), c3, nat1, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, c3)), c3), wcel(c3, cn0))
  hashfzo0(c3)
  mulid1d(c3, w0)
  nn0cnd(c3, w0)
  nn0zd(cfv(chash, c1), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))))))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))))), wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cn0), w0)
  eqeltrd(cfv(chash, c1), cn0, c5, w0)
  fzocatel(cv(hs0), cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c1))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))))), wceq(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)), co(nat0, cfzo, c5)), w0)
  simpll(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1)))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))))
  oveq2d(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1), c5, w0)
  eqtrd(cfv(chash, c1), c5, co(c5, cmul, nat1), w0)
  syl5eq(cfv(chash, c1), co(c5, cmul, nat1), co(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, c5)), cmul, cfv(chash, csn(c4))), w0)
  eqtri(cfv(chash, c1), co(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, c5)), cmul, cfv(chash, csn(c4))), cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c5), csn(c4))))
  fveq2i(chash, c1, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c5), csn(c4)))
  mp2an(wceq(cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c5), csn(c4))), co(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, c5)), cmul, cfv(chash, csn(c4)))), wcel(co(nat0, cfzo, c5), cfn), wcel(csn(c4), cfn))
  fzofi(nat0, c5)
  snfi(c4)
  hashxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c5), csn(c4))
  oveq12d(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, c5)), cmul, cfv(chash, csn(c4)), c5, nat1, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, c5)), c5), wcel(c5, cn0))
  hashfzo0(c5)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, csn(c4)), nat1), wcel(c4, c6))
  hashsng(c4, c6)
  mulid1d(c5, w0)
  nn0cnd(c5, w0)
  sylan(w0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c0)), co(nat0, cfzo, c5)), wceq(cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c0))), c4), wf(c1, co(nat0, cfzo, c5), csn(c4)))
  mpbird(w0, wf(c1, co(nat0, cfzo, c5), csn(c4)), wf(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c5), csn(c4)), co(nat0, cfzo, c5), csn(c4)))
  syl(w0, wf(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c5), csn(c4)), co(nat0, cfzo, c5), csn(c4)), wcel(c4, c6))
  fconstg(c4, c6, co(nat0, cfzo, c5))
  feq1d(c1, co(nat0, cfzo, c5), csn(c4), cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c5), csn(c4)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c1, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c5), csn(c4))))
  fvconst(c1, co(nat0, cfzo, c5), c4, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c0)))
  mp2an(wceq(co(c0, cconcat, c1), cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))), cif(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  eqeltri(c0, universe, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c3), csn(c4)))
  xpex(co(nat0, cfzo, c3), csn(c4))
  ovex(nat0, cfzo, c3)
  eqeltri(c1, universe, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c5), csn(c4)))
  xpex(co(nat0, cfzo, c5), csn(c4))
  ovex(nat0, cfzo, c5)
  snex(c4)
  ccatfval(hs0, c0, universe, c1, universe)
  eqtri(c2, cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c3, caddc, c5)), c4), cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c3, caddc, c5)), csn(c4)))
  fconstmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c3, caddc, c5)), c4)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c3, caddc, c5)))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}

blocks.name: ofcccat
blocks.content: Letterwise operations on word concatenations. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Oct-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm ofcccat(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, cconcat, c1), cofc(c2), c3), co(co(c0, cofc(c2), c3), cconcat, co(c1, cofc(c2), c3))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cword(c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cword(c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c0, cconcat, c1), cofc(c2), c3), co(co(c0, cofc(c2), c3), cconcat, co(c1, cofc(c2), c3)), co(co(c0, cconcat, c1), cof(c2), co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), csn(c3)), cconcat, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)), csn(c3)))), co(co(c0, cof(c2), cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), csn(c3))), cconcat, co(c1, cof(c2), cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)), csn(c3)))), w0)
  ofccat(c0, c1, c2, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), csn(c3)), cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)), csn(c3)), c4, c5, w0)
  3syl(w0, wcel(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), csn(c3)), cword(c5)), wcel(c3, c5), wf(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), csn(c3)), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), c5))
  fconst6g(c3, c5, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))
  iswrdi(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), csn(c3)), cfv(chash, c0), c5)
  3syl(w0, wcel(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)), csn(c3)), cword(c5)), wcel(c3, c5), wf(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)), csn(c3)), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)), c5))
  fconst6g(c3, c5, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)))
  iswrdi(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)), csn(c3)), cfv(chash, c1), c5)
  syl5req(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), csn(c3))), co(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))), cmul, cfv(chash, csn(c3))), w0)
  mp2an(wceq(cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), csn(c3))), co(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))), cmul, cfv(chash, csn(c3)))), wcel(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfn), wcel(csn(c3), cfn))
  hashxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), csn(c3))
  eqtrd(co(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))), cmul, cfv(chash, csn(c3))), cfv(chash, c0), co(cfv(chash, c0), cmul, nat1), w0)
  oveq12d(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))), cmul, cfv(chash, csn(c3)), cfv(chash, c0), nat1, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))), cfv(chash, c0)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0))
  hashfzo0(cfv(chash, c0))
  mulid1d(cfv(chash, c0), w0)
  nn0cnd(cfv(chash, c0), w0)
  syl5req(cfv(chash, c1), cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)), csn(c3))), co(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1))), cmul, cfv(chash, csn(c3))), w0)
  mp2an(wceq(cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)), csn(c3))), co(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1))), cmul, cfv(chash, csn(c3)))), wcel(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)), cfn), wcel(csn(c3), cfn))
  snfi(c3)
  hashxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)), csn(c3))
  eqtrd(co(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1))), cmul, cfv(chash, csn(c3))), cfv(chash, c1), co(cfv(chash, c1), cmul, nat1), w0)
  oveq12d(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1))), cmul, cfv(chash, csn(c3)), cfv(chash, c1), nat1, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1))), cfv(chash, c1)), wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cn0))
  hashfzo0(cfv(chash, c1))
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, csn(c3)), nat1), wcel(c3, c5))
  hashsng(c3, c5)
  mulid1d(cfv(chash, c1), w0)
  nn0cnd(cfv(chash, c1), w0)
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, cconcat, c1), cofc(c2), c3), co(co(c0, cconcat, c1), cof(c2), co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), csn(c3)), cconcat, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)), csn(c3)))), co(co(c0, cconcat, c1), cof(c2), cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, co(c0, cconcat, c1))), csn(c3))), w0)
  ofcof(co(c0, cconcat, c1), c2, c3, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, co(c0, cconcat, c1))), c4, universe, c5, w0)
  syl(w0, wf(co(c0, cconcat, c1), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, co(c0, cconcat, c1))), c4), wcel(co(c0, cconcat, c1), cword(c4)))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, cconcat, c1), cword(c4)), wcel(c0, cword(c4)), wcel(c1, cword(c4)))
  ccatcl(c0, c4, c1)
  wrdf(co(c0, cconcat, c1), c4)
  ovexd(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, co(c0, cconcat, c1)), w0)
  oveq2d(co(c0, cconcat, c1), cof(c2), cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, co(c0, cconcat, c1))), csn(c3)), co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), csn(c3)), cconcat, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)), csn(c3))), w0)
  eqtr4d(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, co(c0, cconcat, c1))), csn(c3)), co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), csn(c3)), cconcat, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)), csn(c3))), cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c3)), w0)
  xpeq1d(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, co(c0, cconcat, c1))), csn(c3), co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))), w0)
  oveq2d(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, co(c0, cconcat, c1)), co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1)), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, co(c0, cconcat, c1)), co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))), wcel(c0, cword(c4)), wcel(c1, cword(c4)))
  ccatlen(c0, c4, c1)
  ccatmulgnn0dir(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), csn(c3)), cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)), csn(c3)), cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c3)), cfv(chash, c0), c3, cfv(chash, c1), c5, w0)
  eqid(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), csn(c3)))
  eqid(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)), csn(c3)))
  eqid(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c3)))
  3syl(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wcel(c0, cword(c4)), wcel(c0, cfn))
  wrdfin(c0, c4)
  hashcl(c0)
  3syl(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cn0), wcel(c1, cword(c4)), wcel(c1, cfn))
  wrdfin(c1, c4)
  hashcl(c1)
  oveq12d(co(c0, cofc(c2), c3), cconcat, co(c1, cofc(c2), c3), co(c0, cof(c2), cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), csn(c3))), co(c1, cof(c2), cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)), csn(c3))), w0)
  ofcof(c0, c2, c3, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), c4, cfn, c5, w0)
  syl(w0, wf(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), c4), wcel(c0, cword(c4)))
  wrdf(c0, c4)
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfn))
  fzofi(nat0, cfv(chash, c0))
  ofcof(c1, c2, c3, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)), c4, cfn, c5, w0)
  syl(w0, wf(c1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)), c4), wcel(c1, cword(c4)))
  wrdf(c1, c4)
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1)), cfn))
  fzofi(nat0, cfv(chash, c1))
}

blocks.name: ofcs1
blocks.content: Letterwise operations on a single letter word. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Oct-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm ofcs1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(cs1(c0), cofc(c4), c2), cs1(co(c0, c4, c2))))
} = {
  syl6eqr(co(cs1(c0), cofc(c4), c2), cs1(co(c0, c4, c2)), cmpt(hs0, csn(nat0), co(c0, c4, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  ofcfval2(hs0, cs1(c0), c4, c2, csn(nat0), c0, universe, c3, c1, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(csn(nat0), universe))
  snex(nat0)
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  simpll(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(nat0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cs1(c0), cmpt(hs0, csn(nat0), c0)))
  eqtrd(cs1(c0), cmpt(hs0, csn(nat0), c0), csn(cop(nat0, c0)), wcel(c0, c1))
  s1val(c0, c1)
  mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(csn(cop(nat0, c0)), cmpt(hs0, csn(nat0), c0)), wcel(nat0, cn0))
  fmptsn(hs0, nat0, cn0, c0, c1)
  eqtri(cs1(co(c0, c4, c2)), cmpt(hs0, csn(nat0), co(c0, c4, c2)), csn(cop(nat0, co(c0, c4, c2))))
  ax-mp(wceq(cs1(co(c0, c4, c2)), csn(cop(nat0, co(c0, c4, c2)))), wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), universe))
  s1val(co(c0, c4, c2), universe)
  mp2an(wceq(csn(cop(nat0, co(c0, c4, c2))), cmpt(hs0, csn(nat0), co(c0, c4, c2))), wcel(nat0, cn0), wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), universe))
  0nn0()
  ovex(c0, c4, c2)
  fmptsn(hs0, nat0, cn0, co(c0, c4, c2), universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cs1(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(nat0))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(nat0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, c4, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ofcs1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(<" c0 ">[oFC(c4)]c2)= <"(c0[c4]c2)">)
} = {
  syl6eqr((<" c0 ">[oFC(c4)]c2), <"(c0[c4]c2)">, (hs0 ∈ { 0 } ↦(c0[c4]c2)), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))
  ofcfval2(hs0, <" c0 ">, c4, c2, { 0 }, c0, universe, c3, c1, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))
  a1i((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), { 0 } ∈ 𝕌)
  snex(nat0)
  simpr(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3)
  simpll(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, hs0 ∈ { 0 })
  adantr(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, <" c0 "> =(hs0 ∈ { 0 } ↦ c0))
  eqtrd(<" c0 ">, (hs0 ∈ { 0 } ↦ c0), { < 0, c0 > }, c0 ∈ c1)
  s1val(c0, c1)
  mpan(c0 ∈ c1, { < 0, c0 > } =(hs0 ∈ { 0 } ↦ c0), 0 ∈ ℕ0)
  fmptsn(hs0, nat0, cn0, c0, c1)
  eqtri(<"(c0[c4]c2)">, (hs0 ∈ { 0 } ↦(c0[c4]c2)), { < 0,(c0[c4]c2)> })
  ax-mp(<"(c0[c4]c2)"> = { < 0,(c0[c4]c2)> }, (c0[c4]c2)∈ 𝕌)
  s1val((c0[c4]c2), universe)
  mp2an({ < 0,(c0[c4]c2)> } =(hs0 ∈ { 0 } ↦(c0[c4]c2)), 0 ∈ ℕ0, (c0[c4]c2)∈ 𝕌)
  0nn0()
  ovex(c0, c4, c2)
  fmptsn(hs0, nat0, cn0, (c0[c4]c2), universe)
  diff.hs0.c(<" c0 ">)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c({ 0 })
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))
  diff.hs0.c(nat0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[c4]c2))
}

blocks.name: ofcs2
blocks.content: Letterwise operations on a double letter word. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Oct-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm ofcs2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c4)), wceq(co(cs2(c0, c2), cofc(c5), c3), cs2(co(c0, c5, c3), co(c2, c5, c3))))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(cs2(c0, c2), cofc(c5), c3), cs2(co(c0, c5, c3), co(c2, c5, c3)), co(co(cs1(c0), cofc(c5), c3), cconcat, co(cs1(c2), cofc(c5), c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c4)))
  syl5eq(co(cs2(c0, c2), cofc(c5), c3), co(co(cs1(c0), cofc(c5), c3), cconcat, co(cs1(c2), cofc(c5), c3)), co(co(cs1(c0), cconcat, cs1(c2)), cofc(c5), c3), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c4)))
  oveq1i(cs2(c0, c2), cofc(c5), c3, co(cs1(c0), cconcat, cs1(c2)))
  df-s2(c0, c2)
  ofcccat(cs1(c0), cs1(c2), c5, c3, c1, c4, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c4)))
  s1cld(c0, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c4)))
  s1cld(c2, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c4)))
  syl6eqr(co(co(cs1(c0), cofc(c5), c3), cconcat, co(cs1(c2), cofc(c5), c3)), cs2(co(c0, c5, c3), co(c2, c5, c3)), co(cs1(co(c0, c5, c3)), cconcat, cs1(co(c2, c5, c3))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c4)))
  oveq12d(co(cs1(c0), cofc(c5), c3), cconcat, co(cs1(c2), cofc(c5), c3), cs1(co(c0, c5, c3)), cs1(co(c2, c5, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c4)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c4)), wceq(co(cs1(c0), cofc(c5), c3), cs1(co(c0, c5, c3))), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c4))
  simp1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c4))
  ofcs1(c0, c1, c3, c4, c5)
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c4)), wceq(co(cs1(c2), cofc(c5), c3), cs1(co(c2, c5, c3))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c4))
  simp2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c4))
  simp3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c4))
  ofcs1(c2, c1, c3, c4, c5)
  df-s2(co(c0, c5, c3), co(c2, c5, c3))
}
